definition: to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress
better a bad life than a good death (idiom)
pinyin: hao3 si3 bu4 ru2 lai4 huo2 zhe5

sentences.english: Or maybe I don't even remember that I was alive.
sentences.chinese: 甚至可能连活着都不记得。

sentences.english: Which living person do you most admire, and why?
sentences.chinese: 你最敬佩哪个活着的人，为什么？

sentences.english: As long as grandpa's grandmother be on the hoof, they would assurance father be also deathless .
sentences.chinese: 只要爷爷奶奶活着，他们会保证爸爸也不死。

sentences.english: For though he was crucified through weakness, yet he liveth by the power of God.
sentences.chinese: 他因软弱被钉在十字架上，却因神的大能，仍然活着。

sentences.english: He that lives upon hope, dies farting.
sentences.chinese: 一味靠希望活着的人，死时不值一文。

sentences.english: If still alive, she must now have been in the flush and bloom of early womanhood.
sentences.chinese: 如果她还活着，如今应该是个楚楚动人的少女了。

sentences.english: One situation in particular kept me grateful to still be alive.
sentences.chinese: 有一次的突发状况让我一直庆幸自己还活着。

sentences.english: But if I live, I'll see you again before you are asleep.
sentences.chinese: 可是如果我还活着，在你睡觉以前，我还要来看你的。

sentences.english: So long lives this, and this gives life to thee.
sentences.chinese: 我的诗便能活着，使你的生命万古流芳。

sentences.english: Old trees are alive antiques and living national treasures.
sentences.chinese: 古树是活着的古董，是有生命的国宝。

sentences.english: How should we live, in light of the facts about death?
sentences.chinese: 我们该如何活着，鉴于这些关于死亡的事实？

sentences.english: Happiness is waking up and realizing that you are still alive.
sentences.chinese: 晨早起来，发觉自己仍然活着，那就是快乐。

sentences.english: You can keep him alive, but that life will be worse than death.
sentences.chinese: 你能让他活着，但对他们而言，真的是生不如死。

sentences.english: Single living for others is a puppet.
sentences.chinese: 单为别人的评价而活着的人无异于傀儡。

definition: better a bad life than a good death (idiom)
pinyin: hao3 si3 bu4 ru2 lai4 huo2 zhe5

definition: life (as the characteristic of living beings)/living being/creature/CL:個|个[ge4],條|条[tiao2]
to drift and live without purpose (idiom); to drag out an ignoble existence
the world/this world/the world of the living
